Affinity for Wizards
When Scholar of Childish Wonder enters, target opponent looks at the top three cards of your library and separates them into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
Conceptualize {4}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its conceptualize cost. If you do, exile it when it enters the battlefield.)[/i]
